title: Zabannian: Your Ultimate Dictionary App
description: The innovative dictionary app designed specifically for English learners of all levels! Whether you're a beginner just starting your language journey or an advanced student looking to refine your skills, Zabannian is here to support you every step of the way.

title: 2048 Game
description: Addictive 2048 game, great time killer, best puzzle game and brain exercise!

title: BMI Calculator
description: Body Mass Index calculator gives out the BMI value and categorizes BMI based on provided information from WHO and CDC for both adults and children.

title: Scientific Calculator
description: A calculator designed to help you calculate science, engineering, and mathematics problems. It has special buttons for parentheses, trigonometric functions, exponents, inverses of trigonometric functions, and Ï€.

title: To-Do App
description: A vertical list of interactive actions or options. It's composed of items presented in a consistent, single-column format, with room for icons, descriptions, side information, and other rich visuals.

title: Rock Paper Scissors Game
description: Rock Paper Scissors is an intransitive hand game, usually played between two people, in which each player simultaneously forms one of three shapes with an outstretched hand.

title: Jofteez - The game of same dices!
description: A React Native game which you have to match same selected dices as soon as you can.

title: Be Yad Biar
description: A React native app which helps you to memorize English Words for Learners.

title: Mine Yab
description: Mine Yab is a Minesweeper. a logic puzzle video game genre. The game features a grid of clickable tiles, with hidden mines scattered throughout the board.

title: Nottie - Professional Notes App
description: With Nottie you have everything you need to keep life organized. Use it for note taking, project planning, and to find what you need, when you need it.

title: Car Run - Endless car game
description: Endless car game built using Unity and React Native.Rules are simple. Swipe and get Coins!

title: See more Projects On Github
